name: stellar-smart-account-examples
description: TypeScript examples for Stellar Smart Account deployment and usage

scripts.prebuild: stellar contract build && npm run generate-bindings && npm run build-packages
scripts.generate-bindings: cd ../packages/smart_account && stellar contract bindings typescript --wasm ../../target/wasm32v1-none/release/smart_account.wasm --output-dir temp --overwrite && cp temp/src/index.ts src/index.ts && rm -rf temp && cd ../factory && stellar contract bindings typescript --wasm ../../target/wasm32v1-none/release/contract_factory.wasm --output-dir temp --overwrite && cp temp/src/index.ts src/index.ts && rm -rf temp
scripts.build-packages: cd ../packages/smart_account && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../factory && pnpm install && pnpm run build

author: Stellar Smart Account Team
